title: Generative AI-Enhanced Advanced Mathematics Learning Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: A course focused on solving math problems and understanding concepts using generative AI in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain step-by-step problem-solving processes for mathematical problems using generative AI tools
Learners can critically evaluate AI-generated results and present at least three criteria for verifying mathematical validity
Learners can create mathematics concept summary portfolios combining peer feedback and AI-supported learning through a relational approach

resources: OER (Open Educational Resources)-based math problem bank
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
